6R6 35 S FST FST 20 SSE MAF 30 NW BGS 40 WNW LBB 30 WSW DHT 25 NE
CAO 20 WNW EHA EHA GUY 50 N CDS 60 SW SPS SEP 50 W TPL 45 NNW SAT 10
SW DRT.

GEN TSTMS ARE FCST TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 50 W MRF 35 NW MRF 20
WSW INK 20 W HOB 50 ENE ROW 25 W TCC 15 NNE TAD 25 WSW LIC 25 WSW
CYS 10 SSW DGW 15 SSE CPR 10 SE VEL 35 NNW PUC 15 E DPG 60 NW P38 20
